messages.subject: KTK 2006 Exhibition catalogues
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - A number of you ordered copies from me of the Kokusai Tosogu Kai s 2006 Exhibition catalogue of their recent Tokyo exhibition of sword fittings and
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

A number of you ordered copies from me of the Kokusai Tosogu Kai's 2006 Exhibition catalogue of their recent Tokyo exhibition of sword fittings and koshirae. A new supply has come in and are now available. To simplify shipping, I decided to make these available to U.S. addresses at $65 post paid shipped priority mail. (Arrival probably in time for Christmas, in case any wives or sweeties are reading this.)

Payment by Paypal to my account (Ron Hartmann -swords@...) is easy, or send me a check at: 5907 Deerwood Drive, St. Louis, MO 63123-2707.

Anyone outside the U.S.A. can hopefully get them from a nearby KTK member. Those members on the List could make this known. (If must be, I can figure shipping outside the states but that's usually expensive and kind of a pain at the post office.)

Here is a brief review of the catalogue by a Pete Klein (from a copy supplied by KTK member Richard Turner...

http://tinyurl.com/y4el2e

Any further question, email me privately and I'll try to answer them. When this group sells, I'll fade off into the sunset...

Ron
STL





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
